statements: SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE amount > 100 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, sender_address, receiver_address, amount FROM transactions WHERE receiver_address = 'Alice';
SELECT sender_address, receiver_address, amount, timestamp FROM transactions WHERE sender_address = 'Bob' ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE amount BETWEEN 50 AND 200 ORDER BY transaction_id ASC;
SELECT transaction_id, sender_address FROM transactions WHERE receiver_address = 'Eve' ORDER BY sender_address ASC;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE amount > 100 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT transaction_id, sender_address, receiver_address, amount FROM transactions WHERE sender_address = '123456' AND receiver_address = '789ABC'
SELECT sender_address, receiver_address, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM transactions GROUP BY sender_address, receiver_address HAVING total_amount > 500
SELECT * FROM transactions ORDER BY amount ASC, timestamp DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT count(*) AS num_transactions FROM transactions WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01'
SELECT * FROM transactions LIMIT 5;
SELECT transaction_id, sender_address, receiver_address, amount FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT sender_address, receiver_address, transaction_timestamp FROM transactions ORDER BY transaction_timestamp DESC;
SELECT block_id, block_hash, block_timestamp FROM blocks WHERE block_timestamp >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM transactions JOIN blocks ON transactions.transaction_id = blocks.block_id;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_timestamp DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, sender_address, receiver_address FROM transactions WHERE sender_address = 'Alice' AND receiver_address = 'Bob';
SELECT transaction_id, amount FROM transactions WHERE sender_address = 'Alice' AND receiver_address = 'Charlie' ORDER BY transaction_timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM blocks WHERE block_timestamp >= '2022-01-01' AND block_timestamp <= '2022-12-31' ORDER BY block_timestamp DESC;
SELECT block_id, block_hash, JSONB_ARRAY_LENGTH(transactions) AS num_transactions FROM blocks WHERE previous_block_id IS NULL ORDER BY num_transactions DESC;
SELECT * FROM transactions ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_amount FROM transactions WHERE transaction_type = 'debit'
SELECT block_id, block_hash FROM blocks ORDER BY timestamp ASC
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE block_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000'
SELECT node_id, node_role FROM blockchain_network
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE transaction_type = 'debit';
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_amount FROM transactions WHERE block_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM blocks ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT node_id, node_address FROM blockchain_network WHERE node_role = 'miner' ORDER BY node_id ASC;
SELECT t.transaction_id, t.transaction_amount, b.block_hash FROM transactions t JOIN blocks b ON t.block_id = b.block_id;
SELECT * FROM transactions;
SELECT transaction_id, amount, timestamp FROM transactions WHERE sender_address = '123 XYZ Street';
SELECT block_id, hash FROM blocks ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT node_id, node_address FROM nodes WHERE is_validator = TRUE;
SELECT block_id, transaction_id, hash FROM blockchain WHERE block_id < 100;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT sender_address, receiver_address, amount FROM transactions WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01' AND timestamp <= '2022-06-30' ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT t.transaction_id, t.amount, b.hash FROM transactions t JOIN blockchain b ON t.transaction_id = b.transaction_id WHERE amount < 5000;
SELECT n.node_id, n.node_address, b.timestamp FROM nodes n JOIN blocks b ON n.node_id = b.block_id WHERE n.is_validator = TRUE ORDER BY b.timestamp;

SELECT t.sender_address, t.amount, b.block_id, n.node_address FROM transactions t JOIN blockchain b ON t.transaction_id = b.transaction_id JOIN nodes n ON b.block_id = n.node_id WHERE t.amount BETWEEN 100 AND 1000;
SELECT * FROM transaction_details ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT transaction_id, block_number, amount FROM transaction_details WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM blockchain_network WHERE block_number < 1000 ORDER BY block_number ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT node_address, is_validator FROM nodes WHERE is_validator = TRUE;
SELECT parent_node_id, child_node_id FROM node_relations ORDER BY parent_node_id ASC, child_node_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM transaction_details WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT transaction_id, block_number, amount FROM transaction_details WHERE amount < 5000 AND timestamp >= '2022-01-01' AND timestamp < '2022-02-01' ORDER BY amount ASC;

SELECT transaction_id, transaction_hash, status FROM transaction_details JOIN transaction_status ON transaction_details.transaction_id = transaction_status.transaction_id WHERE status = 'success' ORDER BY transaction_hash;
SELECT node_id, node_address, is_validator FROM nodes WHERE is_validator = true ORDER BY node_address ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM blockchain_network WHERE previous_block_hash IS NOT NULL AND block_hash IS NOT NULL AND block_number BETWEEN 1000 AND 2000 ORDER BY block_number DESC LIMIT 5;
